February 4, 2015

The U.S. Commercial Service Germany and SelectUSA will attend the 2015 CAR-Symposium, a high-profile automotive industry show in Bochum, Germany. More than 1000 senior managers and decision makers of both automobile manufacturers and suppliers or service providers will discuss the opportunities and challenges facing the global auto industry.

SelectUSA Representative Ed Fantasia will lead a breakout session on investing in the United States and the SelectUSA Summit.

For more information about SelectUSA’s activities at the event, please contact Ed Fantasia at Ed.Fantasia@trade.gov. You can also visit the CAR-Symposium website to learn more about the event.
